welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Cajamarca, Colombia! Get ready to discover the breathtaking landscapes, rich history, and warm hospitality this city is known for. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories exploring all that Cajamarca has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ibague Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Ibague Airport is used for the transportation of goods and packages.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the designated network.
